scope.title: Separator
scope.description: The separator is a div used for visually separating components.

frontMatter.excerpt: The separator composes Flex and is used as a separation element.
frontMatter.mdxContent:
---
title: Separator
package: "@chakra-ui/layout"
image: "components/box.svg"
description: "The separator is a div used for visually separating components."
---

The separator composes `Flex` and is used as a separation element.

## Import

```js
import { Separator } from "components/Separator/Separator"
```

### Usage

```jsx

function Example() {
  const property = {
    imageUrl: "https://bit.ly/2Z4KKcF",
    imageAlt: "Rear view of modern home with pool",
    beds: 3,
    baths: 2,
    title: "Modern home in city center in the heart of historic Los Angeles",
    formattedPrice: "$1,900.00",
    reviewCount: 34,
    rating: 4,
  }

  return (
    <Box>
      <Text align="center" mb="20px">
        This is on above the Separator
      </Text>
      <Flex
        h="1px"
        w="100%"
        bg="linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(224, 225, 226, 0) 0%, #E0E1E2 49.52%, rgba(224, 225, 226, 0) 100%)"
        mb="20px"
      ></Flex>
      <Text align="center">This is on below the Separator</Text>
    </Box>
  )
}
```

```tsx

function Example() {
  return (
      <Text align="center" mb="20px">
        This is on above the Separator
      </Text>
      </Separator />
      <Text align="center">
        This is on below the Separator
      </Text>
  )
}
```
frontMatter.title: Separator
frontMatter.description: The separator is a div used for visually separating components.
